Hi there! Based on your interest in a disaster movie, I think you might enjoy "The Andromeda Strain" (1971). This classic sci-fi thriller follows a team of scientists racing against time to contain a deadly alien microorganism that has wiped out an entire town. With its tense atmosphere and intriguing plot, it's perfect for fans of the disaster genre.

Alternatively, if you're looking for something a bit more recent, "2010" (1982) might be up your alley. This sequel to Stanley Kubrick's "2001: A Space Odyssey" follows a joint US-Soviet mission to Jupiter, where they uncover secrets about HAL 9000 and the fate of the Discovery One. With its visually stunning space scenes and thought-provoking themes, it's a great choice for anyone who loves disaster movies with a sci-fi twist.
